agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture TIME & DATE: 1:00 PM, Monday, March 4, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Bob Hall The Senate Committee on Agriculture and the House Committee on Agriculture & livestock will have a joint hearing Monday, March 4, 2019 at 1:00PM in the Capitol Extension Room E1.016 to hear invited testimony from the following: Texas Farm Bureau Texas and Southwest Cattle Raisers Association Texas Cattle Feeders Association Texas Poultry Federation Texas Association of Dairymen Texas Corn Producers Texas Grain and Feed Association Texas Forestry Association Texas Grain Sorghum Producers Association Texas Food and Fuel Association ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
